text:
Akadema's Coaching Winter Gloves Are Back for the Fall/Winter Seasons
Akadema's winter gloves are ready for the fall baseball season. Great for coaches, parents, and players of all ages.
Hawthorne, NJ, October 22, 2015 --( PR.com )-- With the fall and winter seasons rapidly approaching, it is time to grab your Akadema winter coaching gloves. These gloves are perfect for coaches in the cold weather. The thin design allows for optimal use because of the gripping material on the entire palm while the fleece back keeps the hands warm in any condition. This allows coaches to still hit infield/outfield while staying warm. Akadema winter gloves are also great for parents in the stands and players in the dugout to stay warm during games, without the hassle of a bulky winter glove. Perfect for fall baseball and even winter use. Akadema winter gloves are available in the color black and range in sizes from XS to XXL, perfect for all ages.
